security: Protecting Cuban assets is of utmost importance to the United States, as the spread of news about AMUG's recruitment efforts could jeopardize JUMAVE 1 and JUMAVE 2, according to the document. Specifically, it states: "AS ARE STATING MOST IMPORT TO PROTECT CUBAN EQUITY IN 20 JUMAVE 1 AND OF THAT PROMISE. THIS IF COULD BE PROTECTED ADVERSELY BY SPREAD OF NEWS ABOUT AMUG EFFORTS ON BEHALF OF KUTAK TO EFFECT RECRUITMENTS."
summary: A classified message discusses the interrogation of JUMAVE 1, his potential as a double agent against Cuban intelligence, and the importance of protecting Cuban assets and equities.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET classified message, dated September 30, discusses the interrogation of JUMAVE 1, who denied knowing AMUG despite their case officer relationship and requested release and exile to start a new life. The message emphasizes that obtaining the truth from JUMAVE 1 will be time-consuming, but he could be a valuable asset against Cuban intelligence or POES, and his imprisonment would cover recruitment. It highlights the importance of protecting Cuban equities in JUMAVE 1 and JUMAVE 2 and advises against proceeding against others who received intel training until JUMAVE 1 is producing.
title: DYVOUR PERUMEN AXMUG
